import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import good from '../assets/img/v-good.svg' import excellent from '../assets/img/excellent.svg' import dislike from '../assets/img/thumbs-down.svg' import API from '../API' export default function Review({selectedId, setShowReview, showReview}) { const [reviews, setReviews] = useState() const api = new API() useEffect(()=>{ if(selectedId){ api.getReview(selectedId).then(response=>{}) } console.log(reviews) }) console.log(reviews) return (
setShowReview(false)}> X
